bio: A minor Influencer creating a huge impact: Education/Reviews/AMAs/Collaborations
impactDescription: The posts and video reviews I create for the CIS community Optimism has attracted 5-10 active members to the Ambassador Program in the last 7-8 months. 4 of which have successfully obtained the role of ambassador in training. There were also AMA sessions and events, which I will mention in the CIS community grant.
contributionDescription:
I create educational content about Optimism and ecosystem. Provide information about new activities and results of previous ones. I cooperate with major CIS-influencers and organize contests. My main focus is on Telegram communities & Twitter posts. 

*I am an "ambassador in training" of the project.
